fluids.name: Water
fluids.usageDescription: Can be used to make steam in boilers, or to cool buildings for overclocking in conjunction with a heat exchange system.

fluids.name: Crude Oil
fluids.description: A goopy black liquid, dug up from underground.
fluids.usageDescription: Can be processed in a refinery or distillation column.

fluids.name: Distilled Water
fluids.description: An alternative to water, has a higher heat capacity.
fluids.usageDescription: Can be used in cooling systems or advanced processing.

fluids.name: Coolant
fluids.description: A fluid with a very high heat capacity.
fluids.usageDescription: Can be used in cooling systems.

fluids.name: Petrol
fluids.description: The simpelest result from processing oil.
fluids.usageDescription: Can be used to power steam boilers.

fluids.name: Diesel
fluids.description: A translucent yellow fuel with high energy content. The heavier counterpart to petrol.
fluids.usageDescription: Can be used to power steam boilers.
